item.title: Man accused of dragging state trooper, triggering manhunt arrested: Police
item.description: A Vermont man accused of leading Massachusetts police on a high-speed chase and dragging a state trooper was taken into custody, police said.

item.title: Hurricane Erin picking up steam as it edges along the East Coast

Texas House approves redrawn maps sought by Trump ahead of 2026 elections
item.description: Texas’ House of Representatives is approving a new map that creates up to five new, winnable congressional seats for the GOP.

item.title: WATCH: McDonald's cuts costs of some popular items
item.description: The fast food giant is lowering the prices of its combo meals weeks after the CEO acknowledged that its menu had become too costly.
